scene_description_enriched: A king, adorned with a crown and a long beard, sits on a throne, holding a scepter. He is surrounded by a crowd of people, some seated and others standing, all looking towards him. The architectural setting appears to be an interior space, possibly a hall or court, with a patterned background suggesting a wall or tapestry. The scene depicts a formal gathering, likely a royal audience or a significant event involving the king and his subjects.
